text: Gopal Ballav Pattanaik (born 19 December 1937) is an Indian judge. He was the 32nd Chief Justice of India from 8 November 2002 to 18 December 2002. He was appointed by President A. P. J. Abdul Kalam. He was born in Cuttack, now in Odisha, India. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:Living people Category:Chief justices of India
title: Gopal Ballav Pattanaik
